summary: This immersive mod makes you drop your belongings whenever you transform into a ravenous creature of the night, using a custom mesh.
descriptionHtml:
Whenever you transform, you somehow carry all your potatoes in your fur? Where is your sword? Actually don't answer that...

NOT ANYMORE! With this great mod, you now leave your things in a nice little pile. Not scattered, a custom mesh appears! Once done with your murderous rage, come back to recover your items.

SIMPLES!

Installation
Copy contents of zip into data folder, or install with your favourite mod manage, preferably Mod Organizer.

Uninstallation
Delete contents from data folder

Thanks for looking!
Check out my other mods too

Script source is included for modders.
author: Oliver1706
